pageContext.claim: “MS-13, likewise, a horrible, horrible, large group of gangs that have been let into our country over a fairly short period of time.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump usually mentions the Obama administration, but here he just said "a fairly short period of time." The MS-13 gang far predates Obama, and has been active since the 1980s. According to the Congressional Research Service in 2005 and 2008, the gang had spread across the country since the 1980s. Moreover, the Immigration and Customs Enforcement under Trump has been arresting an increasing number of noncriminals, indicating that it's not just the gang members that are being targeted by his administration.
